governance.daoTokenDescription: DAO governance token for gold-backed project - ASA.Gold. Empower community members to influence project decisions through a transparent, onchain, publicly auditable process. Shape the future of gold-backed digital assets collaboratively, ensuring trust, fairness, and a stake in the success of ASA.Gold. Join the gold revolution now!

tokens.governanceTokenMainnetId: ASA.Gold governance token Algorand Mainnet ID:
tokens.reservesAddress: Address holding all gold reserves NFTs:
tokens.goldTokenDescription: ASA.Gold is the groundbreaking publicly auditable gold token. Backed by physical gold reserves, our onchain eshop ensures real-time audits accessible to all, guaranteeing the authenticity and value of each token. Invest with confidence in a new era of gold-backed digital assets, where trust and accountability converge seamlessly.

home.letsBreakGoldMarket: Let's bring the gold market to the next level
home.goldMarketRevolution: We bring revolution to gold market
home.buyUseAudit: Buy, use, or sell gold token backed by real gold Everybody can audit our reserves - its what we sell in the eshop Visit our gold eshop including secondary marketplace Each gold coin has its NFT, which can be traded using smart contract or DeFi NFTs in stock can be redeemed by parcel delivery within EU area
home.startupDescription: The startup ASA.Gold has been started in October 2023 with goal to tokenize real world asset which users can fully trust. To allow this we created hypothesis that if person can select in the eshop any product and this can be shipped to him, he trusts that all other products are real as well. There is no incentivization from ASA.Gold to cheat because of this public oversight.
home.revolutionDescription: Weight of gold in the reserves is always higher then minted gold backed tokens. This is ensured by the smart contract on public blockchain network - Algorand.

priceList.buyGoldTokenDex: Buy gold token using DEX aggregator
priceList.sellGoldTokenDex: Sell gold token using DEX aggregator
priceList.buyGoldTokenBank: Buy gold token using bank transfer
priceList.dexCharges: DEX aggregator charges approx 0,1% from the volume, and according to the selected AMM pools they charge liquidity slippage fees.
priceList.bankCharges: Your bank may charge you additional fee. We will reimburse any fees to our bank account to you (SEPA standard and SEPA instant payments are free. This mostly applies to SWIFT payments.).
priceList.rfqPrice: RFQ price acquired is calculated as top price from multiple gold selling price feeds.
priceList.rfqFinal: Your RFQ price is final and includes the commission.
priceList.addGoldDescription: When we purchase real gold coin or ignot, we state the price of this purchase as numismatic value at time of purchase to the NFT. This numismatic price is expressed in the gold token price which means that the price divided by grams of gold at the purchase gives the real percentage of numismatic value. We add usually 3% to this price and sell it to public through NFT sale. The numismatic value added may change in special cases such as a rare coins or may be lower in some discounted sales.

carousel.buyGoldNftTrade: Buy the gold coin NFT, trade the NFT or request physical delivery
